channel.title: Help me! Crazy SYIpkpker wont give up!
channel.description:
Ok so this SYIpkpker crashed me.. I got pissed so i IP'ed him. The prob is that he leaves his program running so my runserver.bat says "name failed to login because there IP is banneed" And soon my server crashes because the runserver is processing to much I guess.. Ive had my server down for 9 hours + and every time i put it up he comes back!
HELP ME PLEASE!

item.title: Help me! Crazy SYIpkpker wont give up!
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

[quote=“1 0wn3d U I, post:8, topic:228025”]Open up client.java and search for:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Then directley under that add:

public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } }

This can also be used to block about ppl trying to pretend to be owners, admins etc…[/quote]
Epic failure remove that piece of shit right now.
The term ‘SYI’ is just a name. The program was supposibly first created by ‘Slowpoke?’ and he made it for kicks. What the program does is trys to connect to your server but when the server accepts its login packet it stops there resulting in a inconplete log in so when you type it ::players you can see the name sometimes but is not on but it still causing the server to stress out more data/ram W-E to finish that packet while the program continues to make more incomplete logins with unicodes at the end. That piece of shit you posted just SOMETIMES stops normal players from putting these things on but doesnt stop the loginprocess which causes you to lag… why doesn’t this work? Well first of all he doesnt log in at all for once >_> second if he completes the first phase of the log in, your just gotten a bit more lag and he will continue to do this. Btw ipbannin this system MIGHT work as there is some copycat shit programs out there but all the ipban does is stop the complete log in of someone who is ipbanned… what you need to do is to do the meiscooldude tut to disallow multiple connections that will stop the syi from making more log ins…

Read full topic
item.source: Help me! Crazy SYIpkpker wont give up!

item.title: Help me! Crazy SYIpkpker wont give up!
item.dc:creator: @lunden lunden
item.description:
@lunden wrote:

[quote=“moparpkerwood, post:23, topic:228025”][quote author=1 0wn3d U I link=topic=299684.msg2407671#msg2407671 date=1219783027]
Open up client.java and search for:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
Then directley under that add:

public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } }

This can also be used to block about ppl trying to pretend to be owners, admins etc…
[/quote]

Cheers for that a nice easy way and small code to stop him doing it[/quote]
That doesnt stop SYIpkpker.
That only stops players to use dumb symbols in theyr names

Read full topic

item.title: Help me! Crazy SYIpkpker wont give up!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“wasabiie, post:2, topic:228025”]I feel more sorry for the guy who is using the crasher, leaving it on for 9 hours on a (my guess)shitty server.

This guy must be dedicated. -.=[/quote]Not dedicated, obsessed. kinda creepy if you ask me… still i think you can set a bot and walk away from a computer. worst case scenario the kid forgot he left his bot on your server ^-^ Longest ive had mine down was 2 days. but it was back when my server was crap =P so i wasn’t worried too much. So don’t worry about it you’ll be back in no time. hopefully you dont have like 30-40+ people. but really, i haven’t seen an SYI that works, and until then i say all SYI tricks fail. you can’t IP ban a file that isnt even logged in… thats what they tend to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me! Crazy SYIpkpker wont give up!
item.dc:creator: @1_0wn3d_U_I 1 0wn3d U I
item.description:
@1_0wn3d_U_I wrote:

Open up client.java and search for:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Then directley under that add:

public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } }

This can also be used to block about ppl trying to pretend to be owners, admins etc…

Read full topic
